item.description:
Yes, for once it's not snowing!

At this meetup we'll talk about a couple of IIS plugins for 7.5 that can dramatically affect the perceived speed of your Sitecore solution. We'll also talk about web and machine config settings that can squeeze more horsepower out of your web server. Finally, we'll talk about Url Rewriting, some simple SEO tweaks, and 301-ing all those legacy URLs. NOTE: WE'RE MEETING ON THE 5th FLOOR TO ALLOW FOR MORE ATTENDEES.
item.name: Tweaking your Production Sitecore Installation
